author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 19-year-old girl died after she reportedly slipped and fell from the terrace of one of the hostels inside College of Engineering in Guindy on Sunday.

Kotturpuram police, who are investigating, said Shanmugha Preetha (19), second-year student of B.Tech. Ceramic Technology, fell to death from the multi-storied Nandhi Hospital at 10.15 p.m. The girl is a native of Tiruvarur district, the police said, adding that further investigations were on to ascertain the exact cause of death.
title: Girl student falls to death
